attributes.action: Furlough the partners and family members of the critically extremely vulnerable.
attributes.additional_details: If financial support is not given to this group of people during the pandemic they will be forced to work in environments where the virus is easily transmitted. This in turn will mean that the Critically Extremely Vulnerable who are shielding will face a high risk of being exposed to the virus. This in turn will increase pressure on the NHS and overwhelm our hospitals.
attributes.background: Furlough should be give to the house hold members of the Critically Extremely Vulnerable

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559141
